channel.title: CVE Feed for flexmls -- Flexmls速 IDX Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for flexmls -- Flexmls速 IDX Plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-8719|2024-10-17T13:03:28.942Z -- flexmls -- flexmls%C2%AE%20idx%20plugin
item.description: The Flexmls速 IDX Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via several parameters like 'MaxBeds' and 'MinBeds' in all versions up to, and including, 3.14.22 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
